channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Icy roads on Links Estate, BR1, 3rd January
item.description:
Could all roads on the Links Estate please be gritted as there are currently very icy conditions on the slopes amd hills, making driving very dangerous. From New Street Hill at the railway bridge, through to the whole estate. Thank you. Cllr Alisa Igoe
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Street Hill, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping of a Christmas tree, 3rd January
item.description:
Someone has just dumped a Christmas tree outside our home. This is the photo. Please remove this asap. I have since moved it onto the street so that people can pass by on the pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glyn Road, Hackney, London
